entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 7:30 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: -7.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -11.3°C
Wind: SSE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening then northeast 40 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries south of Plum Point. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Local amount 2 cm south of Plum Point. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023
